TopicTitle: [WIP] NASA SLS - Released: Orion MPCV Core Module 1.0 [4/18/2015]

Articles.Content: Tell me about it, the shaders used in KSP are terrible. Hopefully, when they convert to Unity 5 and we can use PBR, we'll be able to accomplish something closer to this render.

Here is the new engine integrated into the second stage ICPS.

In other news, I'm shopping for texture replacement plugin to include both the white and black Orion textures in the mod. So far I've tried Firespitter (with no luck, can't even get the contextual menu to display in the VAB).

Happened the same to me with Fustek space station parts, it only works with an specific version of the plugin, I'm using the one included by Sumghai.

Okay. That settles it. I'll offer the two textures as two different downloads (with different model names, so you can have both). I'd rather have it this way than have a mod that sometimes works if you have the correct version, which would be broken if the author of that mod updates. Plus, with KSP 1.0 dropping in a few days, I think it would be better to not rely on dependencies which might be broken in the release.

Perfect choice!

Can you please release the upper part (docking adapter)? That way with some other parts resizing we can use the capsule

I'm working on it

It's not only the docking adapter though. It also has RCS ports, parachutes, and the docking adapter

Perfect choice!

Can you please release the upper part (docking adapter)? That way with some other parts resizing we can use the capsule

You can grab the part out of AmericanPack and, or CMES , And sure there are a handful more mods with that part

EDIT- And has the white been release

I was looking through my old imgur files and found this.

For those of you who have wondered why I've taken so long to release this.... you know, since I first started on the Orion over 9 months ago. Since then, I've literally remade and remade and remade the orion at least a dozen times (probably two dozen). Here is a comparison of my first orion 9 months ago and the final version. Practice does pay off in the end, I think
Looks like the one you was going to use JSI glass so you could see the kerbals inside
Opinions?
Very Nice ! noonespecial
OOO. Keep it up!
Looking Awesome
Simply gorgeous!
Nice work on the panels. But I would consider a separate build from the service module (I think that this is a raw version, the umbilical looks like a simple rectangle lol)

The MPCV may already exist in game in the form of simghai's SDHI, I haven't checked yet to see if the scale matches the SLS. If it does match, then one less part(s) to make. Otherwise SDHI doesn't match, I will make a matching version.

One of the more remarkable aspects of this long distance deployable space station is "...provides deep space vehicle assembly...". Sounds like there is an existing mod to compliment that no? Also, did you notice the central component?

This part screams "SCIENCE!". Although, coding is my weakness and I'm not confident in my skills to be able to code a new science device. But I'm willing to give it a try. Can't be that hard, can it?
